ModMetaData.name: Zeta Reticulans [Player/Hostile Factions]
ModMetaData.author: GarbageDayIsHereToStay
ModMetaData.description: (Newest patch notes on workshop; Release Version: 21-06-2020) \nCold and mechanical Zeta Reticulans are unaffected by most human emotions. Their frustrations mostly stem from whether work standards are being kept and mission guidelines followed; Their greatest joy is working in their field of expertise.
